extends CouponClientFacadeSuperClass
implements CouponClientFacade

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      The method converts a Coupon object into a database record and links it to the specific Company.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> getAllCoupons()
      This method gets the set of all active coupons released by the Company.
      Company getCompany()
      This method gets the Company object of the Company that manages the account.
      Coupon getCoupon(java.lang.String id)
      This method gets any Coupon that was released by any Company by its' ID (for reading only).
      java.util.Set<Coupon> getCouponsByDate(java.sql.Date date)
      This method gets all the Coupons released by specific Company that will end before definite date.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> getCouponsByPrice(double price)
      This method gets all Coupons released by Company under the definite price.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      This method gets all Coupons released by Company by Coupon type.
      void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This method checks if the Coupon released by the Company that manages the account and removes the Coupon if the Coupon belongs to the Company.
      void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This method checks if the Coupon released by the Company that manages the account and updates the end date and the price of the Coupon if the Coupon belongs to the Company.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompanyFacade

        public CompanyFacade(java.lang.String compName)
        Class constructor. There is no ability to construct abstract CompanyFacade, each facade of this type is linked to specific Company in order to forbid access to other Companies' accounts.
        Parameters:
        compName - The name of the Company
